General.Name: Kama Co Ltd
General.Description: KAMA Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells trucks, micro and light trucks, engineering trucks, special cars, electric vehicles, pickup trucks, and internal combustion engines in China. It also offers single and multi-cylinder diesel engines; oil pump products; small mechanical and electrical products; alternators; agricultural machinery; and tea garden machinery. The company provides trucks under the Kama, treasure, and Austrian brands. The company also exports its products to Iran, the Philippines, Egypt, Syria, Pakistan, Algeria, and other countries. KAMA Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Shanghai, China.
